snippet: "The Artist" may have an advantage at the SAG Awards thanks to its large cast of what are known as day players.
abstract: "The Artist" may have an advantage at the SAG Awards thanks to its large cast of what are known as day players.
lead_paragraph: LOS ANGELES - For all the bridesmaids in "Bridesmaids," and all the housemaids in "The Help," the most actor-packed film in the race for the ensemble cast award from the Screen Actors Guild on Jan. 29 might be the one about a supposedly solitary silent movie star - that is, "The Artist."

headline.main: Maybe It Should Be Called 'The Artists'
